response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This price reflects a fair compromise, ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost while allowing me to maximize the return on this investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 11500}
